segments.text: Thank you so much . I can't take this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She will insist . It's a rosary . She has millions of them . Take it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did she mean just now about raising pigs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh ! My grandmother used to say “ raising pigs , raising kids ... at least you can eat the pigs . ”
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ha-ha . I get it . That's funny . Your cousin's a real sarcastic lady .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She likes to complain about her macho husband and her “ bambinos ” , but she loves them all dearly .
segments.speaker: S2
